articles.description: Byron Buxton hit his sixth home run in his last five starts and the Twins used seven pitchers to hold off Seattle. MLB batting average leader Luis Arraez also kept up his hot hitting.
articles.content:
SEATTLE Most good traveling acts save their biggest hits for the encore. The Luis and Buck Show prefers to get right to work.
Luis Arraez lined the game's first pitch into center field for a single,… [+3259 chars]
